references.paper_title: APIGen: Automated pipeline for generating verifiable and diverse function-calling datasets
references.reason: This paper introduces APIGen, which is extended by APIGen-MT, making it a foundational reference for the approach used in this paper.

references.paper_title: Tau-bench: A benchmark for tool-agent-user interaction in real-world domains
references.reason: This paper describes T-bench, one of the key benchmarks used for evaluating the performance of the models trained using the data generated by APIGen-MT.

references.paper_title: Reflexion: language agents with verbal reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper introduces Reflexion, a key concept used in APIGen-MT for the LLM review committee and for stabilizing the simulated human.
This paper presents the BFCL benchmark, which is used for evaluating the function-calling capabilities of the models trained with APIGen-MT data.

references.paper_title: Llamafactory: Unified efficient fine-tuning of 100+ language models
references.reason: This paper introduces Llama-Factory, the tool used for finetuning the new XLAM-2-fc-r models.
